section.name: Welcome to Wicket-Dojo
section.p: The powerful and easy-to-use Object-Orriented Web framework wicket meets Dojo, a javascript toolkit which let's you make your webapps even more useable, responsive, and functional. This includes graphical decorations, AJAX functionality and other javascript enhancements.

ul.li: Read our weblog or some Wicket blogs

section.p: Wicket is released under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

section.name: Latest News

subsection.name: January 4, 2006 - DojoAutoUpdateHandler, try it now!
subsection.p:
We have just finished our latest component. It is an Ajax auto update handler. Since it uses Wicket's beta functionality to render a singel component, you can currently only use it with the HEAD version of Wicket.
We've included a tutorial in our tutorial section which should get you started right away!

section.p: See the news archive for more (older) news.

section.name: Special Thanks
section.p: We would like to thank Topicus for making this project possible and we would also like to thank Wicket and the entire community for making such a cool framework. And of course Dojo for being the coolest javascript toolkit out there.
